name: PicNikem (Online)
description:
Nick: verb
British slang: to steal

PicNikem is a game about ruining picnics for the locals, such that the balance of nature may be restored and undisturbed once again.
The goal of the game is to collect enough picnic baskets such that this goal is achieved, but be aware! Someone is not pleased with your goals and will try and stop you to the best of his abilities.

The game was created for Create Jam Spring 2022, by The Fursquad, consisting of:

  • Mathias: Programming, Art, Play-testing and Game Design
  • Frederik: Music

Controls:
Movement - W A S D
